message.raw:
* segway/run.py (quote_trackname): always use capital letters (RFC 3986)
(Runner.supervision_type): remove unreachable code (thanks to Max)
(Runner.progress_train_instance): actually run training round
(Runner.recover_train_instance): remove code that results in wrong
parameter files being recovered in case of 0 instances

* segway/input_master.py: move comment

* segway/_util.py (make_template_filename): removed
(save_substituted_resource): new
(save_template): refactoring

* segway/data/segway-wrapper.sh (stdout_filename): fix LSF error where
  new temp dir not created

* test/simpleconcat/touchstone/traindir/segway.str: indentation
* test/simpleseg/touchstone/traindir/segway.str: indentation
* test/data/traindir/segway.str: indentation
* test/pyflakes/run.sh: switch to importing pyflakes, don't search
 build/, dist/, ez_setup.py

* ez_setup.py: change to 0.6c11

* install.py: rebuild to remove PyFlakes warning
